scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:backend
scripts.serve: npm run build:frontend development && npm run start:backend
scripts.serve:dev: npm run build:frontend --mode development && sudo rm -rf /var/www/test.wehub.work/dist/* && sudo cp -r frontend/dist/* /var/www/test.wehub.work/dist/ && sudo systemctl restart apache2 && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env development --only backend-dev
scripts.serve:prod: npm run build:frontend production && sudo rm -rf /var/www/wehub.work/dist/* && sudo cp -r frontend/dist/* /var/www/wehub.work/dist/ && sudo systemctl restart apache2 && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env production --only backend-prod
